function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive analysis of register-based data with flourishing as a predictor","Impact":"Inability to understand the costs associated with flourishing and non-flourishing individuals in a population","Mitigation":"Conducting a comprehensive analysis of register-based data with flourishing as a predictor","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding the potential return on investment from programs and policies promoting mental health and well-being","Impact":"Inability to assess the economic benefits of implementing such programs and policies","Mitigation":"Conducting economic impact assessments of mental health and well-being programs","Technologies":"Economic modeling, cost-benefit analysis","People":"Policymakers, economists","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inability to analyze associations between flourishing and economic outcomes in contexts without federal statutory requirements for paid sick leave and universal health insurance coverage","Impact":"Limited understanding of the economic implications of flourishing in different healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Comparative analysis of economic outcomes in different healthcare systems","Technologies":"Economic modeling, comparative analysis","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
